channel.title: The Gareth Emery Podcast
channel.description: Official podcast from international trance DJ producer Gareth Emery
channel.itunes:subtitle: The official podcast from Gareth Emery
channel.itunes:author: Gareth Emery
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the Gareth Emery podcast! Currently ranked as the world's no.13 DJ by DJ magazine, Gareth each week handpicks some of his favourite electronic tracks of the last 7 days. Keeping true to his roots and not afraid to stray from the norm, Gareth keeps fans coming back for more offering a carefully selected array of genre hopping records. There's no wonder why his podcast has seen numerous Miami IDMA nominations for 'Best Podcast' and is an essential and highly lauded download for music lovers.
